com.azure.storage.blob

Class BlobContainerClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.storage.common.BaseClientBuilder<T>
      • com.azure.storage.blob.BaseBlobClientBuilder<BlobContainerClientBuilder>
        • com.azure.storage.blob.BlobContainerClientBuilder

  • public final class BlobContainerClientBuilder
extends BaseBlobClientBuilder<BlobContainerClientBuilder>
    Fluent ContainerClientBuilder for instantiating a BlobContainerClient or BlobContainerAsyncClient using BlobContainerClientBuilder.buildClient() or BlobContainerClientBuilder.buildAsyncClient() respectively.

    The following information must be provided on this builder:

    • the endpoint through .endpoint(), including the container name, in the format of https://{accountName}.blob.core.windows.net/{containerName}.
    • the credential through .credential() or .connectionString() if the container is not publicly accessible.

    Once all the configurations are set on this builder, call .buildClient() to create a BlobContainerClient or .buildAsyncClient() to create a BlobContainerAsyncClient.
